text: The Men's 100 metre butterfly competition of the 2018 FINA World Swimming Championships (25 m) was held on 12 and 13 December 2018 at the Hangzhou Olympic Sports Center. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text- align:center |- ! !!
